com.eemi.ext4j.client.chart.saving

Class ImageExport

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eemi.ext4j.client.core.JsObject
      • com.eemi.ext4j.client.chart.saving.ImageExport
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JpegExport, PngExport

    public class ImageExport
extends JsObject
    Config option for exporting a chart to an image. It is expected that the user will be prompted with an image download. As such, the following options should be set on the server:
    • Content-Disposition: 'attachment, filename="chart.png"'
    • Content-Disposition: 'attachment, filename="chart.png"'
    • Content-Type: 'image/png' or Content-Type: 'image/jpg'

    Important: By default, chart data is sent to a server operated by Sencha to do data processing. You may change this default by setting the defaultUrl of ImageExporter.

    Author:
    alainekambi
